name: TrustNet
tag_list: cloud, security, security-as-a-service, cloud-security, saas, network-compliance
overview: TrustNet is a leading provider of managed Security-as-a-Service delivered from the cloud. TrustNet helps businesses build trusted relationships with their customers, partners, and employees by providing IT security and compliance services. TrustNet is PCI Qualified Security Assessor and provides compliance assessments and security services for PCI, HIPAA, SOX, and SOC/SSAE16. Since 2003 TrustNet has been a strategic partner helping clients ensure the security and integrity of their businesses. From our headquarters in Atlanta, Georgia TrustNet focuses on serving small and mid-size organizations, across multiple industries, in the United States and around the world.
